title: Premium Messaging App Interface
description: A visually stunning, premium messaging app interface using a minimal light theme with sage green accents.
generation_hints: Use WebSocket (socket.io-client) for real-time messaging updates
Add optimistic UI updates for sending messages
Implement proper image lazy loading with next/image
Use formatDistanceToNow for relative timestamps or format for exact times
Add proper loading states with skeleton loaders for chat list
Use proper semantic HTML for messages (article, time)
Add ARIA live regions for new messages and typing indicators
Implement keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+Enter to send, Esc to close)
Use virtual scrolling for long message threads
Add proper error boundaries for failed message sends
Use proper focus management in message input
Add accessibility labels for icons and status indicators
Implement message grouping by sender and time
Show typing indicators with animated dots
Add neumorphic shadows and sage green accents as per design theme
